title: Foundation Course
subtitle: Classes 6-10
description: Build unshakeable foundations in Mathematics, Science, and English. Our comprehensive program ensures academic excellence and prepares students for competitive success ahead.
features: Complete NCERT mastery with advanced concepts
Weekly assessments with detailed performance analysis
Interactive digital learning with visual teaching aids
highlights: Small batch sizes for personalized attention

title: JEE Preparation
subtitle: Engineering Entrance Coaching
description: Master engineering entrance exams with our proven methodology. Expert-crafted curriculum focusing on conceptual mastery, strategic problem-solving, and exam excellence for aspiring engineers.
features: Complete JEE syllabus with advanced problem-solving
Weekly mock tests with rank analysis & improvement strategy
Daily practice problems (DPP) with detailed solutions
15+ years previous papers with pattern analysis
highlights: Faculty with proven track record in JEE coaching
All-India level test series with detailed rank analysis

title: NEET Preparation
subtitle: Medical Entrance Coaching
description: Achieve medical dreams with our comprehensive NEET preparation. Expert Biology, Physics, and Chemistry coaching with NCERT-focused approach and strategic test preparation.
highlights: Focus on NCERT and previous years

title: Board Excellence Program
subtitle: Class 10 & 12 Board Preparation
description: Score 95%+ in board exams with our systematic approach, regular tests, and comprehensive study material.

title: Olympiad & NTSE
subtitle: Competitive Exam Preparation
description: Specialized coaching for Olympiads (IMO, NSO, IEO) and NTSE with focus on logical reasoning and conceptual depth.
features: Mock tests based on exam pattern

title: Crash Course Programs
subtitle: Rapid Exam Preparation
description: Intensive crash courses for last-minute preparation with focus on important topics, shortcuts, and exam strategies.
